item.title: My understanding of Blogdown & Github:
item.description: Introduction & Prerequisites Getting the Blogdown Package Creating a local site Have Github Upload your site to github Installing Git Adding git to the computers PATH variables Upload your site to github, for real this time Have Netlify Build Netlify Site Deploying From Github Introduction & Prerequisites The My Understanding of series is my attempt at writing concise guides for my future self on how to do complicated or infrequent jobs.
